content: worry worms are super cute aren t they well i think so they are small enough to fit in your pocket and they are squishy and soft and just nice to have around i always had an issue with the googly stick-on eyes most worry worms are given i always worried he he that they would fall off and i don t like embroidering eyes either so after a bit of trial and error i designed this pattern for safety eyed worry worms and i would like to share it with you all happy crocheting without the worry us crochet terms 4 mm/4 5 mm hook aran/worsted or chunky/bulky yarn both work
